prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
GANESH CHUKKA						
Mobile: +91 -7673900920					             
Email: ganeshchukka77@gmail.com	
PROFFESIONAL SUMMARY: 
Overall 9+ years of experience and Having Around 5+ years of professional experience in IT industry with SQL Server, Azure AND SSIS projects and extensive usage of ETL, Analysis Services like, SQL Server Integration Services SSIS.
3+ Year of Usage experience on Azure ADF
2+ years of experience in MSBI 
5+ Years of proven experience in Middle Ware, Application and Production Support of L1&L2 that includes identifying the application and database bottleneck issues and fixing them on priority basis, and immediate resolutions of application bugs in production environment.
Imported data from multiple data sources (SQL server database and Excel file) into ADF created relationships between data created calculated columns and measures.
Very Good experience working in Azure Cloud, Azure DevOps, Azure data factory, Azure Data Lake Storage, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Analytical Services
Perform on going monitoring, automation, and refinement of data engineering solutions, prepare complex SQL Views, reusable stored procedures, and target tables in Azure synapse analytics 
Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency, and workload management.
This role will be responsible for creating Data orchestration with Azure Data Factory Pipelines & Dataflows. Key role is to understand the business requirements and implement the requirements using Azure Data Factory
 To Process effective management of organized data using Data Governance to check Data Quality, Security and Data Accessibility 
Experience utilizing: Azure (Data Factory, Data Lake, Machine Learning, SQL Warehouse).
Experience in using recursive CTEs, CTE, temp tables and effective DDL/DML Triggers to facilitate efficient data manipulation and data consistency as well as to support the existing applications.
Good Knowledge on Dynamic-queries, sub-queries, and complex
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
